alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Millard and Juab Counties; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 6:51PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN JUAB...CENTRAL WASATCH AND SOUTHERN UTAH COUNTIES... At 651 PM MST...an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Timber Lakes to Utah Lake to 8 miles southwest of Elberta...and moving east at 30 mph. Locations impacted include... Provo, Payson, Orem, Spanish Fork, Springville, Santaquin, Mapleton, Salem, Elk Ridge, Woodland Hills, Rocky Ridge, Brigham Young University, Palmyra, Lake Shore, Benjamin, Spring Lake, Utah Lake, West Mountain, Elberta and Timber Lakes. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 233 and 268. US Route 6 between mile markers 130 and 135, and between mile markers 144 and 208. US Route 40 between mile markers 22 and 47. US Route 89 between mile markers 300 and 312. * winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. * sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible in this area of heavy snow.
